title: The Great ‘Avatar’ Debate with Blank Check’s Griffin Newman and David Sims
description:
‘Avatar: The Way of Water,’ the sequel to the most lucrative movie of all time, is slated for the end of this year. Does anyone care? Sean is joined by Griffin Newman and David Sims, hosts of the ‘Blank Check’ podcast, to discuss the lasting impact of James Cameron’s technologically revolutionary behemoth, and more importantly, whether ‘Avatar’ is actually good.

Host: Sean Fennessey
Guests: Griffin Newman and David Sims
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
